thread.title: Attend the Georgia State vs. Appalachian State Football Game and Stay at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter
thread.title_full: Attend the Georgia State vs. Appalachian State Football Game and Stay at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Attend the Georgia State vs. Appalachian State Football Game and Stay at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter
text:
Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter offers affordable lodging for the Georgia State vs. Appalachian State football game on October 10, 2015.
 ATLANTA, GA, October 06, Football fans attending the Georgia State vs. Appalachian State football game on October 10 will find affordable lodging at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter Hotel . The Sun Belt Conference rivals will meet at the Georgia Dome in downtown Atlanta, with kickoff at 3:30pm.
"We look forward to welcoming fans attending the Georgia State/Appalachian State football game on October 10," notes Shabbir Lightwala, General Manager at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter. "Our location near the Dunwoody MARTA Station allows our guests to take a train to the Georgia Dome and avoid downtown traffic," explains Lightwala.
Guests at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta Perimeter hotel North will enjoy well appointed rooms with free high speed Internet and Simply Smart beds with a choice of pillows. Extended Stay Suites offer the added convenience of a microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher. The delicious Express Start Breakfast Bar, with signature cinnamon rolls, is complimentary. Hotel amenities include a seasonal outdoor pool, 24-hour fitness center, business center, and free garage parking. Tennis courts and walking trails are just next door at Hammond Park. Complimentary weekday shuttle transportation is available within a three mile radius of the hotel including Perimeter Mall.
The Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter is located on Hammond Drive, near the intersection of I-285 and GA 400. Current lodging specials include the Romantic Escape Package and the In-Room Pizza Package. AAA, senior, and military rates are available. IHG Rewards Club members will earn points toward free hotel nights with no blackout dates.
For more information about the Georgia State University football schedule, visit www.georgiastatesports.com . To book your stay at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Atlanta North Perimeter Center hotel , call 404-250-4450 or visit www.PERIMETERHOTEL.com .
About Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Atlanta North-Perimeter/Dunwoody
The Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Atlanta North-Perimeter/Dunwoody is directly off Georgia 400 and I-285. This means they're just minutes from several corporate offices and training centers. Additionally, Buckhead, Sandy Springs, Roswell, the Dunwoody Medical Centers, Northside Hospital, Children's Health Care, St. Joseph's, and the Dunwoody MARTA station are nearby. Enjoy a memorable stay at our modern Perimeter hotel, part of Atlanta's upscale corporate Perimeter Center. With our courteous staff, reasonable rates, and terrific amenities, this Atlanta Perimeter hotel is the place to "Stay Smart" in the Perimeter Center area.
For more information visit: http://www.PERIMETERHOTEL.com
For all media inquiries, please contact:
Allison Reinert
Cardinal Web Solutions
